name: amiando
tag_list: events, event-community, , ticketing, event-registration, conferences, seminars, tournaments, parties
overview:
amiando is a pioneer in online event registration and ticketing. Since its foundation in 2006, amiando has become a leading software-as-a-service platform for professional events.

amiando’s products help event organizers to reach a professional level of event organization which, until now, was only reserved for large corporations and event agencies. All tools are online-based and immediately available for use, without the need for software installation. Over 180,000 event organizers worldwide use amiando, including prestigious names such as Facebook, BMW, UNESCO, and Telefónica O2.

amiando has been awarded numerous prizes for its innovative products, among them the “Technology Pioneer of 2010” at the World Economic Forum, and the “eco Internet Award” as the best business client portal.

amiando has been part of XING AG since December 2010, an operator of the business network XING.

funding_rounds.source_description: Online event organizer amiando closes its first financing round successfully

acquisition.source_description: Social Network XING Buys Events Services Provider Amiando

external_links.title: Lack of time stymies social media plans for more than half of event organisers
New Managing Director at amiando: Norbert Stockmann

name: GetYourGuide
tag_list: online-travel, web-2-0, tour-guide, travel, travelers, tours, marketplace, eth-zurich
overview:
GetYourGuide collects and categorizes all the world’s things to do so people research less and do more. Electric bike tours around Paris, skip-the-line tickets to the Vatican museums, cooking classes in Thailand, or double-decker bus tours of New York City, GetYourGuide covers every category of activity in nearly every corner of the globe.

GetYourGuide’s global network of activity suppliers upload products, receive, and manage their bookings and payments through a simple, centralized system. Travelers can then easily find and book all of these offers on GetYourGuide.com, choosing the one that best suits their travel dreams and their budget.

GetYourGuide works with a network of over 1,000 partners, including TripAdvisor, Thomas Cook.de, Kayak, and Expedia, and holds offices in Berlin, Las Vegas, and Zurich.

funding_rounds.source_description: Getyourguide

milestones.source_description: With 210,000 Users In Europe, Travel Startup GetYourGuide Takes Its iOS & Android Apps Stateside

name: ResearchGate
tag_list: academia, research, social-network, scientific-network, research-blog, research-jobs
overview:
ResearchGate is the leading social network for scientists. It offers tools and applications for researchers to interact and collaborate. ResearchGate offers a social, crowdsourced platform designed for researchers. The platform provides a global scientific web-based environment in which scientists can interact, exchange knowledge and collaborate with researchers of different fields.

The results of ResearchGate’s new search engine, called ReFind, are not merely based on keywords, but selected in an intelligent way based on semantic, contextual correlations.

funding_rounds.source_description: ResearchGATE Closes Series A Funding for Social Media Site for
Founders Fund Invests in ResearchGate, The Professional Network For Scientists
Bill Gates, Benchmark And More Pour $35M Into ResearchGate, The Social Network For Scientists

name: Videoplaza
tag_list: video-advertising, video, stockholm, london, overlays, prerolls, adserver-for-video, monetising-online-video
overview:
Videoplaza powers the video advertising businesses of broadcasters, publishers and ad networks, enabling IP-delivered video advertising revenues to be maximised. Videoplaza’s sell-side ad serving and management platform, Karbon, monetises video experiences across PCs, mobile devices, tablets, game consoles, IPTV, Smart TV and HBBTV.

Headquartered in London, with offices in Stockholm, Paris, Berlin, Cologne, Madrid, Singapore, and Bangkok, Videoplaza works with a global client base including M6 (FR), Canal+ (FR), SBS (NL), RTL (BEL), Sony Entertainment (IND), Blinkbox (UK), Vocento (ES) and TV4 (SE).

name: My-Hammer
tag_list: builder, plumber, painter, carpenter, gardening, tradesmen, service-providers, electrician
overview:
MyHammer is an online marketplace and directory which facilitates homeowners finding tradesmen and vice versa. Customers can search the directory or post their job in the market place and wait for tradesmen to quote online. The service is free for homeowners and tradesmen pay a small fee on jobs they are awarded. Tradesmen are rated based on the quality of the work they do allowing them to build a national profile. This allows homeowners to find reliable builders and builders to find quality job leads.

The company was founded in 2005 and operates in Germany, The United Kingdom and Austria. There are around 1.5 million users of which 250,000 tradesmen and MyHammer claims to be the market leader in Europe.

There are approximately 70 employees at the head office in Berlin and these include Markus Berger-de Leon who is the acting CEO. He was previously the CEO of StudiVZ and the managing director of Jamba (now Fox Mobile). Gerrit Mueller is the COO and General Manager of international business. Previously, Gerrit was the Senior Director of mobile products at Yahoo in London and worked for eBay Germany where he helped launch the first eBay mobile market place. Jan Seidler is the CTO and also worked for eBay as the head of product strategy.

funding_rounds.source_description: EDGAR

name: skobbler
tag_list: skobbler, lbs, navigation, gps, mobile-social-networking, friend-finder
overview:
skobbler is a Berlin-based maps and navigation app maker, and a management buy-out from Europes Nr. 3 navigation supplier (Navigon).

The skobbler company was founded during a spin-off in September 2008 and has been developing its very own software for mobile phones ever since. skobbler strives to offer smart products that provide orientation and fun on the OpenStreetMap.

skobbler has won the Navteq EMEA LBS challenge 2009.

name: metaio
tag_list: augmented-reality, mobile, advertising, marketing
overview:
Founded in 2003, metaio is a pioneer in the field of Augmented Reality (AR), constantly working on revolutionizing interfaces. We make the digital a natural experience!

According to Gartner Inc., Augmented Reality is one of the Top 10 strategic IT technologies of our time. Moreover, Juniper Research recently forecasted $1.5 billion revenue stream by 2015. But AR more than a statistic- we are at the dawn of a new era, as the virtual and the real gradually unify. With Augmented Reality technology we can access, understand and enjoy digital content overlaid on the physical world- exactly where we want it to be! AR is undoubtedly the user interface of the future.

With more than 10 years of experience, 500+ projects, more than 450 business customers, an international partner network, numerous federal, national and international research projects and a comprehensive, patented product portfolio, metaio is a pioneer and leader in this game changing technology field. Using our Unifeye platform we can connect any physical object, location, or image to digital information. Our vision is the seamless and easy integration of the virtual into the real world.

milestones.source_description: MEtaio, Inc. will Launch it's Mobile Augmented Reality Platform Junaio on November 2nd

external_links.title: metaio's next generation mobile AR browser

name: Geewa
tag_list: multiplayer-game, game, casual-game, flash-game, mobile, iptv, flash, prague, central-europe
overview:
Geewa develops and operates real-time casual competitive browser-based games for web, mobile phones and interactive TV.

The Geewa 3.0 platform (released in May 2009) provides full social gaming support, incorporating a web messenger (in-browser IM), original “animated avatars”, virtual goods, micro-payments, player competitions and more.

In 2010 Geewa released its first game on Facebook called Pool Live Tour. The game is continuously growing in popularity and as of September 2011 amongst the Top100 Facebook Applications with over 1.200.000 DAU.

Geewa’s business model is based on 2 main revenue streams. The first one is user generated micro-transactions and virtual goods. The second one is advertising (primarily premium ad positions, i.e. pre-roll and post-roll with stable 10% CTRs).

Based in Prague, Geewa is enabling players around the world to compete in real-time. As of September 2011 Geewa features about 7mil unique visitors per month either directly on Geewa.com, Facebook or via partners sites using Geewa’s white-label multiplayer gaming platform.

Geewa is a 2008 Red Herring 100 Europe Winner and a Global Red Herring 100 Finalist.

funding_rounds.source_description: Czech Online Games Site Geewa Funded

milestones.description: Berlin office

name: Smart AdServer
tag_list: ad-serving, mobile-advertising, tablet-advertising, ad-server, mobile, iptv, rich-media, mobile-display, mobile-ads, iphone-advertising, ipad-advertising, android-advertising, mobile-ad-serving, ipad-ads, tablet-ad-serving, android--ads

Smart AdServer SAS develops and markets one of the main ad serving technologies for the management of online campaigns for media agencies and publishers.

Created in 2001, the company Smart AdServer, has 300 customers for 1600 sites spanning four continents, among them: Zed digital, Starcom, Mindshare, Mediacom, Mediaedge:cia, Universal McCann, Tomsâ€™s Hardware (Bestof media US), Reed Business, Axel Springer Hungary & Poland, Radio Canada, MSD Global, Wolters Kluwer, La Vanguardia, Canal+, Curse Gaming

Smart AdServer SAS develops and markets one of the main ad serving technologies for the management of online campaigns for media agencies and publishers. name: GRIN Publishing
tag_list: publishing, academic, book, ebook, print-on-demand, saas, software, cloud-publishing, digital-first, publishing-software, publishing-solution, ebook-distribution
overview:
GRIN Publishing is an online based publishing software which already manages over 200,000 books. They provide an easy way for publishers to publish digital and print on demand books and distribute them in all relevant online bookstores and e-readers worldwide. GRIN Solutions offers a variety of basic and advanced features for publishers (like a web presence, e-commerce solution, multi-channel distribution and royalty payments) and makes them accessible both to small publishers and publishing startups trough automation and a competitive price point.

Their platform uses an open API and encourages other systems and web applications to integrate with its publishing engine. Currently they offer integration with systems such as PayPal, Google Analytics and several other services.

name: alaTest
tag_list: alatest, aggregator, consumer-electronics, reviews, ratings, content-provider, sentiment-analysis, semantic-web
overview:
alaTest collects, analyzes and distributes reviews of consumer electronic products (currently 13 million reviews from over 2000 international sources).

The service combines reviews and ratings from various sources to come up with an overall “alaScore” (quality rating) for each product.

The alaTest content delivery service allows partners to tap into the potential of reviews: higher sales conversions, more loyal customers, SEO benefits.

alaTest won the Red Herring Global 100 award as one of the most promising tech companies in the world.

name: IntraWorlds
tag_list: candidate-engagement, talent-sourcing, talent-relationship-management, active-recruiting, hr-marketing, employer-branding, alumni-management, non-profit-solutions
overview:
IntraWorlds is a leading provider of innovative talent sourcing solutions. The talent communities from IntraWorlds are being used by HR specialists to form ties with and acquire top talent from around the world. Take advantage of this technology to provide a reliable supply of desirable candidates.

As your strategic partner, we help you drive the changes to your recruiting process. As specialists in talent relationship management and active recruiting, we support you in successfully appealing to and forming ties with suitable candidates. Whether it’s former interns, contact from trade fairs and workshops or highly convincing “second-best” candidates — IntraWorlds supports you in the establishment and maintenance of your high-value talent pool.

Our solutions take your viewpoint as recruiters into account, and also your talent’s point of view. Our top priority is helping you win the best candidates for your company. With our help, your company will establish a successful recruiting system that offers better planning and greater readiness for the future.

Talent sourcing solutions from IntraWorlds are trusted by well-known companies from all industries, including acknowledged talent powerhouses like Accenture, Adidas, BMW, KPMG, McKinsey and PwC. Whether for talent or alumni, for entry-level workers or industry veterans, we develop a solution to fit your company’s needs. Put your trust in more than a decade of experience on the part of IntraWorlds and fill 30% more open positions at half the cost-per-hire. Take advantage of this opportunity and talk to us!

video_embeds.embed_code: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=I0Fgi3OyM6k
video_embeds.description: Talent Sourcing Solution - Product Introduction of IntraWorlds

name: Escapio
tag_list: travel, europe, boutique-hotels, luxury, design-hotels, romantic-hotels
overview:
Escapio connects sophisticated travelers with distinctive hotels.

At Escapio, we are dedicated to making it as simple as possible to find a distinctive hotel that meets your needs. We have created a portal that enables you to find satisfying results quickly and easily, or take your time and enjoy the sights. Escapio comes from “escape”: Refuge, getting away from it all, from the myriad of overlapping offers and demands of everyday life. Intelligent search parameters provide rapid access for travelers who know what theyâ€™re looking for. We have analyzed the needs and wishes of sophisticated travelers and offer a new kind of online search: Travel topics such as Gourmet, Design, Wellness, hotel types such as romantic hotels, spa hotels, regions such as Tuscany, Bavaria and the Andalusia and seasonal events such as vintage or classic festivals Targeted, efficient searches are as easy as “surfing” and exploring the numerous offers.

name: Tamundo
tag_list: marketplace, collectibles, unique-items, germany, ebay-competitor, social-marketplace
overview:
Located in Berlin, Germany, Tamundo is a fast-growing Start-Up company that has developed the first social marketplace for unique items and collectibles in Germany. Sellers on Tamundo are allowed to sell everything but industrial mass production products and offer buyers a unique shopping experience.

Unlike other marketplaces, Tamundo actively involves its user’s in participating in the development of the site. As part of the Tamundo community, users can dsicuss items and about their field of interest, share and post events, upload their collections and show it with photos or video.Tamundo is THE new place in the web for collectibles. Everything from vinyl, coins, arts & antiques, toys & models can be found on Tamundo!

At the moment, the site lists about 500.000 items on the plattform becoming a home for fans and enthusiasts of online auctions who still look for the special bargain and unique item which cannot be found at a regular online shop or other marketplaces.

external_links.title: Tamundo takes on eBay in Germany

name: Preview Networks
tag_list: preview-networks, online, video, syndication, preview, content, film, trailer, trailers, movie
overview:
Preview Networks is a content marketing platform for brands and content aggregation and syndication platform for publishers. We provide the tools for brands to centrally distribute and manage marketing and PR content across media destinations, devices, and commerce platforms; allowing media partners to automate content acquisition delivering audience and advertising revenue growth.

With 7 offices operating in 10 markets in Europe, we work with over 300 content companies to distribute more than 350 million video streams and 2.25 billion images across over 2,500 media destinations including websites, social networks, mobile apps, tablets, and connected TV.

The company is privately held and venture backed by Sunstone Capital.

For the most recent updates about Preview Networks visit www.previewnetworks.com

tag_list: radio, personal, streaming, audio, pandora, last-fm, hardware, car, automotive, mobile, on-demand, music, spotify, rdio
overview: AUPEO! is the leading provider of personalized audio streams for internet-capable hardware devices and offers radio stations that compile an individual music program for users and recommend songs to them. The recommendation technology is based on an algorithm from the Fraunhofer Institute, inventors of the MP3 format. AUPEO! works together with numerous tier 1 manufacturers of internet-capable audio devices and can be found on the web at www.aupeo.com, as iPhone/ iPad and Android app as well as being available on Netbooks, Connected TVs, nearly all Webradio devices and many Smartphones. Partners include Acer, ASUS, MINI, Philips and Loewe, among others.

name: Webtrekk
tag_list: online-analytics, optimization, real-time-analysis, marketing-segmentation, multi-channel-marketing-attribution, clickstream-analysis, marketing-roi
overview:
WebtrekkÂ´s Q3 web analytics solution enables online marketing managers to focus marketing spend and optimization efforts where they will have the most impact by providing a data driven overview of all online marketing and acquisition efforts. Large amounts of data are presented in an easy to understand format for immediate and accurate marketing decisions based on comparing all forms of disparate variables in any time frame.

This type of data also enables drill-downs to each unique visitor (and visitor sessions) as well as the fastest real-time segmentation available today.

It was designed for marketing managers that require robust content analysis, scenario analysis, profile mining, onsite search, multi-site analytics, graphical clickstream analysis, and promotional effectiveness.

Leveraging the “raw” data (instead of aggregated data) for all online analysis will enable the online marketing manager to be completely flexible with every analysis, correlating together any pieces of information. Using “real-time” data enables the marketing manager to get answers to ROI questions by performing queries instantly on any past data.

A sampling of clients include Allianz, Esprit, Siemens, Flatex, Map24, Bosch, and Die Zeit.

funding_rounds.source_description: Corporate Finance Partners VC & Zanox Publisher Initiative Contest

name: Kaeuferportal
tag_list: b2b, lead-generation, germany, sme
overview:
Kaeuferportal is a B2B Lead Generation platform targeting the German market for SMEs.

Kaeuferportal facilitates business purchasing of products and services for SMEs, which do not belong to the main area of expertise of the respective enterprise. The buyer obtains 3 offers from independent local suppliers. This allows for a qualified purchasing decision, saving time and money. This service is provided free of charge.

Leveraging the reach of the internet, procurement requests are aggregated. Suppliers pay per lead with no fixed costs involved.

funding_rounds.source_description: GrÃ¼nderszene

overview: txtr is building products and services for digital reading, such as ebook shop websites, apps, as well as reading devices and tablets. txtr partners with device makers, mobile operators, and retailers to build the largest ebook distribution platform in Europe.

funding_rounds.source_description: 3M Invests in eReading Technology Company txtr

name: Panfu
tag_list: virtual-worlds, children, language-learning, games, educational, multiplayer
overview:
Panfu is a safe virtual online world for children. Here they can play educational games, meet and chat with friends.

When our children surf the Internet, they should, above all, be having fun and surfing content which corresponds to their age and development. In the virtual world of Panfu, young Internet users between the ages of 8 and 12 years will find a wide range of free and child-appropriate online games including a safe and supervised chat tool, learn languages and the option to care for a virtual pet. Every child in Panfu can individually stylize their own panda and set up and decorate their own tree-house. Creativity is particularly encouraged in Panfu. Panfu is colourfully designed and advertisement free to members (Gold Pandas). In addition to the exciting online games children will also have the chance to socialise with children of their age through chatting and developing friendships. Parents can take a virtual tour of Panfu, which provides an overview of all the games and learning possibilities.

Panfu secures 3 million Euro second financial round
Panfu is largest virtual world in Europe with 10 million users

name: Bumblehood
tag_list: software-development, web
overview: Bumblehood is a company specialized in developing web 2.0 and 3.0 software. It is currently engaged in maintaining a semantically classified WYSIWYG information portal (located at www.bumblehood.com), based on the BumbleMap software platform. The portal is oriented towards providing a knowledge base about countries and cities worldwide â€“ covering topics ranging from geography, economy, politics, history and popular culture, to useful facts about landmarks, organized tours and transport services, as well as information on local businesses (restaurants, hotels, etc.).

name: Refined Labs
tag_list: refined-labs, refined-ads, search-engine-marketing, sem, bid-management, online-marketing, ppc, pay-per-click
overview:
Refined Labs is developing an Online Marketing Toolbox that helps agencies, direct SEM advertisers as well as affiliates to optimize their ROI on advertising money spent.

Refined Labs was founded by Thomas Bindl in early 2007 and got a first round of financing from Holtzbrinck eLAB in late 2007.

The first product, Refined Ads, is a fully integrated toolset to manage and optimize Performance Marketing campaigns. It has interfaces for PPC (Google AdWords, Yahoo SearchMarketing, Microsoft AdCenter, Yandex and Baidu), Affiliate Marketing (Zanox, TradeDoubler and affilinet), display marketing, social media and SEO. It is considered Germany’s leading performance marketing technology.

Clients include Opodo, Sixt, T-Mobile, experteer as well as leading agencies like metapeople, blue summit, PLAN.NET or OMG4CE.

funding_rounds.source_description: Refined Labs Blog

name: Plazes
tag_list: places, maps, social, community, location, geo-presence
overview:
Plazes allows you to find out what others are up to and see what’s happening at different locations. Users share where they currently are, what they’re doing and post future plans. Posting this information can be done on Plazes.com or by mobile phone (via text messaging). Users can also join groups to stay connected with their favorite people and “Plazes.”

The idea behind the service is for everyone to be able to track the places, activities and people in their lives.

The service used to force users to download software which auto-determined user location. In May of 2007, they changed the way they handled location and a download is no longer required.

While not exactly the same, Plazes has many similarities to Twitter and Jaiku.

acquisition.source_description: Breaking: Germanyâ€™s Plazes Acquired By Nokia

name: Qiro
overview:
Qiro GmbH runs the mobile & online community Qiro. As a unique service for the handset, Qiro connects a community with a localization- and buddy finder-service as well as providing over a million static/dynamic points of interest over a backgroup of digital maps.

The service answers the most frequently asked question automatically: â€œwhere are you?â€ Qiro continuously shows its users where they are currently located, who is near-by at that time and what is happening in that area as well as enabling the user to make low-priced contact with friends.

Qiro offers business partners via its location based services an extensive and innovative level of advertising that can be distributed to customers pending on where they are about at the time.

In order to receive the service, users can register via PC and download the software free of charge onto their mobile phone. Qiro is currently usable in all German mobile networks.

funding_rounds.source_description: HTGF Press Release
IBB Press Release (In German)

financial_org.name: Investment Bank of Berlin - VC Fonds

name: imedo
tag_list: imedo, health-community, gesundheit, community, medizin, medicine, health-2-0, web-2-0
overview: imedo is a German health community that enables patients to take control over their health by sharing advice on e.g. diseases or treatment options and finding people with similar health challenges. Among its popular features are a doctor recommendation service “virtual hugs” and online support groups.

funding_rounds.source_description: Gründerszene

name: mokono
tag_list: advertising, media, blogs, publishing, blog-advertising
description: Enabling bloggers to generate ad revenue
overview:
mokono is a next generation media company which centers on providing a furtile environment for content creators such as bloggers to produce content they are passionate about, build audiences and monetize their audience, if they wish to by connecting marketers to their audiences.

mokono draws from the knowledge of hosting some 1M blogs across Europe and has pioneered new ways of using advertising in the blogosphere by using participative ad formats. mokono has started measuring campaign results via the increase in volume of mentions which have proven to significantly increase after a campaign, including clients such as Nokia, T-Home or BMW. This concept of measurement has initiated a discussion among advertising experts beyond Germany. In May 2009, the iab made volume of mentions an integral part of it’s social media definitions.

With up to 14 million unique users a month, mokono provides significant reach for marketers and agencies at scale that wish to address the most influential web crowd in Germany and the rest of Europe. Furthermore, mokono supports agencies and companies in the web 2.0 - environment by actively providing knowledge and expertise. In February 2007, Germany’s media giant Burda acquired a stake in the company.

mokono was founded in 2005 by Florian Wilken and Vasco Sommer-Nunes. The two high school friends form a complementary team, with mokono being their second venture. From 1997 to 2002 they founded and managed an online dating company, which was acquired in 2002, by then the third largest online dating property in Germany.

funding_rounds.source_description: German Media Giants Invest in Blog.de and myphotobook

acquisition.source_description: Populis Acquires Germanyâ€™s Largest Blog Network â€“ mokono â€“ For $11.4 Million

name: Aloqa
tag_list: lbs, proactive-lbs, community-lbs, location-provider, push, ajax, lbs-trigger, event-driven
overview:
Aloqa is a mobile service that proactively notifies users about interesting places, services, events, and people close to where they are. Once you download and start Aloqa, you need to just look at your phone and it shows you live information about interesting things in your vicinity like your favorite coffee shops, highly rated restaurants, local bargains and coupons, Facebook friends in the vicinity, even kid friendly events. When you change locations, Aloqa refreshes itself automatically and notifies you of the relevant set of services, points of interest, events, and friends close to your new location. Wherever you are, whenever you go.

In addition, Aloqa provides an API for easy development of location-based services, especially for proactive and community oriented applications. Examples contain detecting automatically the proximity of two mobile targets (such as Facebook friends), sorting a buddy list by current distance and automatically updating the list as well as clique observation (show me when 3 out of 5 of my myspace girlfriends are nearby).

funding_rounds.source_description: Former Googler Sanjeev Agrawal To Lead Just-Funded Mobile Search Startup Aloqa

acquisition.source_description: Motorola Acquires Location-Based Mobile Software Startup Aloqa

video_embeds.embed_code: See this video on Vator.tv »

name: United Maps
tag_list: orientation, navigation, pedestrian, innovation, cartography, neogis, gis, conflation, mapping, maps
overview:
United Maps strategy is to licence basemaps - from vehicle navigation market leaders like Navteq, Tele Atlas or AND â€“ and algorithmically match them with value-added cartographic data and relevant information layers thereby conflated into new data products.

United Maps generates content-rich, white-labeled, highly detailed and fully routable vector maps for mobile and pedestrian usecases.

Proprietary conflation algorithms automatically match vectorized basemaps with a high degree of precision.

Relevant content layers are added for mobile usecases and seamless multimodal navigation:

Â» public transport (subway, tram, railnetworks)

Â» pathes, walkways and trails for hiking and outdoor

Â» precise house footprints, addresses

The hyperlocal mapping products enable location-based applications, media and services for connected mobile devices, BPO, LBS and multi-modal navigation on a mobile, human scale.

United Maps operates in B2B and professional services, offering white-labeled and on-demand services.

Germany is scheduled for Q1/09, followed by Austria, Switzerland and a rollout of 200 larger European cities.

funding_rounds.source_description: High-Tech GrÃ¼nderfonds, Bayern Kapital and SpaceTec Capital Partners to invest in United Maps GmbH
United Maps announced 7 digits Series-A funding

name: 15Talents
tag_list: students, recruiting, recruitment, project, projects, internship, efficiency-in-recruiting
overview:
15Talents is a marketplace that brings together top-students and companies across countries and sectors. For a competitive compensation students will work on projects/tasks needed by the originator. This creates a win-win situation, students earn money, gain experience and establish contacts in the business world whereas companies receive needed results for favourable costs and gain additional recruitment opportunities.

15Talents is a joint venture between the publishing house “Die ZEIT Online” and the consultancy “trommsdorff + drüner, innovation + marketing” headed by Prof. Dr. Volker Trommsdorff and Prof. Dr. Marc Drüner.

external_links.title: Prof. Dr. Marc DrÃ¼ner zum Projekt-Marktplatz 15Talents.com fÃ¼r Unternehmen und Studenten
DJ ots.Corporate News: Die Zeit / Zeit Online und trommsdorff + drÃ¼ner  starten die...

name: TRIBAX
tag_list: tribax, social-network, communities, white-label
overview:
TRIBAX is an experienced provider of Web 2.0 solutions and strategy for clients from all industries. Based on our consulting expertise and our own Social Media framework, weâ€™re offering custom-tailored solutions for your communication and sales challenges. Hundreds of community- and service portals have already been implemented with TRIBAX Social Media CMS.

TRIBAX supports people in sustainably organising, maintaining and expanding their existing and newly created relationships.

TRIBAX delivers Web 2.0 strategies and functionalities for

  • open websites
  • closed/ exclusive networks
  • personalized invitation and dialogue processes.

Tribax is both a service provider for strategic planning, implementation and operations of communication platforms and full-service provider of a modular â€œsocial software CMSâ€.

Using online mechanisms of social interaction, participation and self-organisation, Tribax supports you in targeting and addressing your market in order to

  • gain and retain customers
  • gain and qualify partners
  • qualify and involve employees.

After several years of technology development, Tribax was founded by a group of experienced internet software entrepreneurs and online marketing experts in 2007. Among the active stockholders: Karsten Schneider (founder of Intershop), the Investitionsbank Berlin, Christian Fenner, and the current Managing Directors Oliver Schwarz and Phil v. Sassen.

funding_rounds.source_description: IBB Beteiligungsgesellschaft, Phoenix Foundation und Berliner Privatinvestor finanzieren Wachstum der TRIBAX GmbH

name: servtag
tag_list: nfc, rfid, mobile-tagging, social-network, location-based-services, lbs, location-tagging, object-based-services, people-bookmarking, near-field-communication, urban-infrastructure
overview:
Servtag is an object- and location-based service provider. Servtag uses Near Field Communication (NFC) to link physical objects and locations with online data and information. Next to NFC, the company uses various forms of input such as QR-Codes, text messages, GPS, geo-coordinates, etc. to provide services.

Servtag is also the maker of friendticker (www.friendticker.com) - a mobile location-based service. friendticker is a location-based mobile marketing platform that puts brands in front of customers by adding virtual check-ins to their brand or venue. friendticker gives real-life value to a customerâ€™s mobile actions beyond the gaming aspect of first generation virtual check-in technology. People actively engage with brands and are rewarded for such interaction.

name: barcoo
tag_list: mobile, scanning, barcode, consumer
overview: barcoo links products in stores with independent consumer information. The shopper scans the barcode of a product using a standard cell phone camera and receives information via the mobile internet. Depending on the product category, the information can include local price comparisons, test reports, allergy, health and green information.

funding_rounds.source_description: EU co-funding

milestones.description: Launch of service
milestones.source_description: Press release for launch of service

milestones.description: barcoo started the traffic light for food products two months after their launch in January. barcoo shows the user at-a-glance if the food you are thinking about buying has high, medium or low amounts of fat, saturated fat, sugars and salt. This got them

name: sofatutor
tag_list: video, tutoring, elearning, crowdsourcing, education
overview: sofatutor.com is an innovative online-education-platform. Short video tutorials are helping high school and college students to study for exams and recapitulate lessons. Subjects like mathematics, physics or economics are divided into short lessons. The tutorials are being produced by (ex-)teachers, tutors and students. Everyone can upload videos on sofatutor.com and earn money by participating in the revenue-sharing model of the service. Experts check the quality of each educational video before it is published. sofatutor offers subscriptions for 8-14 euros per month. The revenue is shared with the producers who earn royalties on a per-click basis. The startup sofatutor was founded in 2008 in Berlin and launched in 2009. For more information visit www.sofatutor.com.

funding_rounds.source_description: Sofatutor closes Series A round to expand video courses
Online Tutoring Platform Sofatutor Raises ‘Mid Single-Digit Million Euro’ Round From Acton Capital Partners

external_links.title: EDUKWEST #83 with Andreas Spading of sofatutor

name: studdex
tag_list: study-aborad, university, universities, student, summer-school, degree, free-mover, exchange
overview:
Studdex is the complete solution for international student recruitment, helping institutions of higher education reach motivated students from all over the world. Studdexâ€™ mission is to bring competent students from every background to universities worldwide.

Through studyadvisor.com, studdex has created an international higher education database with tens of thousands of programs at over 300 higher education institutions around the world. Over 50,000 prospective students have signed up and can search this comprehensive international education database for the college or university of their dreams. Theyâ€™re assigned personal study advisors to ensure that they are well informed and that their applications are polished, complete, and of high quality.

With services such as application and lead handling, student recruitment and university and college advertising, studdex makes student recruitment simple, streamlined, and professional. Studdex provides two-fold solutions for students looking to study abroad as well as university admission panels and marketing teams. Universities looking for international students can get flooded by leads that go nowhere. To make the student recruitment process better, the services offered by studdex allow colleges and universities to spend more time on students that will be an asset to their university. By reducing the expenditure of resources in pursuit of serious applicants, universities can focus on welcoming bright and competent students from all over the world.

Student recruitment is crucial to the survival of most colleges and universities; studdex strives to empower university admissions with perfect applications and worldwide exposure to a growing network of students eager to study abroad. Join studdex and take the next step towards better and more effective student recruitment.

Studdex â€“ No leads student recruitment.

name: hooolp
tag_list: live-music, calendar, live-music-search-site
overview: hooolp GmbH was founded in 2009, offers a search engine for live music as well as a ticket price comparison for concert tickets and now runs the most comprehensive database for concert dates in Germany as well as multiple award winning iPhone- and Android Apps for ticket price comparison „Best Price Ticket“. With band-box a tool for bands, clubs, festivals, agencies and labels is being offered, that significantly facilitates the daily work of all these groups.

milestones.description: hooolp GmbH founded.

name: kontoblick
tag_list: banking, germany, hbci
overview:
kontoblick is the first and only web app for personal financial management in the German market.

Launched in November 2008, kontoblick features all typical personal finance tools, including anonymous use and highest security standards.

tag_list: poster, canvas, print-on-demand, creativity, greetingcard, community, gallery, photography
overview: mygall is an art gallery and creative community for buying, selling and creating individual artworks.

name: headr
overview: vive lets you video chat with your friends and meet amazing people on Facebook! Share your awesome, ask for advice, laugh and learn, be inspired!

name: Kazzong
tag_list: music, social-network, mp3, download, distribution
overview:
Kazzong is a decentralised, direct-to-fan music distribution system in the Web 2.0 age.

Music fans can discover, listen and comfortably purchase music via Kazzong widgets. Users are able to create their own Kazzong Players with their favourite music. These players can be placed on community profiles and websites. Artists and labels are provided with a fast and simple promotion and distribution tool for their music. Kazzong widgets allow artists to present themselves online wherever there is attention by music buyers and potential fans.

name: YOOSE
tag_list: mobile, mobile-avertising, mobile-coupons, affiliate-platform, advertising, lbs, location-based-advertising, location-based-couponing, seedcamp, seedcamp-2008
overview:
YOOSE: the hyper-local mobile ad network. We help large brands, deal sites and independent businesses to engage with consumers through location targeting and mobile couponing.

The YOOSE mobile advertising platform broadcasts in-app ads and coupons through an extensive global network of smartphone apps and sites. Advertisers can maximise their location-based campaigns to achieve targeted reach, rapid ROI and measurable results.

Headquartered in Singapore, YOOSE has offices in Berlin and India.

YOOSE was selected as a finalist in Seedcamp 2008.

Like us on Facebook: http://www.facebook.com/pages/YOOSE/117660424941 Follow us on Google+: http://gplus.to/YOOSE Follow us on Twitter: http://twitter.com/YOOSE Link up with us at LinkedIn: http://www.linkedin.com/company/YOOSE Watch our videos on Youtube: http://www.youtube.com/user/YOOSEMobileAds

name: Sauspiel
tag_list: schafkopf, online-schafkopf, gaming, community, bavaria
overview:
Sauspiel is the largest web community around the German cardgame Schafkopf.

Sauspiel was founded in early 2007 by Martin Kavalar, Agnes Reissner, Jan Bromberger and Stephan Eichler. It is financed solely by its founders. Since the launch, approximately 100.000 users have signed up to play the traditional Bavarian Card Game Schafkopf (SheepÂ´s Head), which makes Sauspiel by far the largest site for online Schafkopf. Playing for points is free, Premium memberships and playing cash games for small stakes is also available. In addition to the game itself, Sauspiel also offers several community oriented features like player profiles, guestbooks, private messages and a map of all registered players.

name: ROCKET RENTALS
tag_list: twitter, marketing, soccer, web
overview: ROCKET RENTALS is a Web solutions agency whose day-to-day business is rocket science.

name: 3Gstore
tag_list: iphone, shop
overview:
A german online-store for the revolutionary Apple iPhone sold without a contract. While iPhones are usually only sold bundled with a T-Mobile contract and with a SIM-Lock 3Gstore started importing not-locked iPhones from foreign markets where the iPhone is sold without a contract and is selling them to german customers.

Apple tried stopping 3Gstore from selling iPhones in their store by sending a cease & desist letter for using their product pictures on their website.

In early October 2011 3Gstore.de was sold to Teebik Inc for 135.000 â‚¬ (ca. 180.000 US$).

3Gstore sues T-Mobile for claiming 'exclusivity' for iPhones in Germany

name: hiogi
tag_list: mobile, answers, qa, community, community-software, seo, forum-solution, saas, b2b-whitelabel-solution
description: hiogi runs a German knowledge community
overview:
hiogi is a community that answers mobile adhoc questions that are submitted via Twitter SMS, WAP, iPhone or wireless email.

Anybody can participate in exchanging know-how, experiences, advice, research results or plain information. hiogi brings questioners, who travel a lot and who do not have a lot of time together with the answerers, who sit in front of their computers and who are willing to help.

The hiogis battle each other 8 minutes for the best answer and every question has a ranking of 2-5 coins, depending on the difficulty of the question. A third independt hiogi checks and confirms the best answer and gets one coin for that. Every coin is one chance of winning several cool prices by the end of the month.

hiogi runs mainly in Germany under www.hiogi.de and offers whitelabel community solutions to companies with a world-wide leading SaaS model under. This customer involvement platform generates massive SEO-power and includes all mobile inbound channels, so that customers can help each other even, if they are traveling.

funding_rounds.source_description: hiogi has three new investors
Third investment round: hiogi raises new venture capital

name: UpdateStar
tag_list: software, search, updates, pack
overview:
UpdateStar is the leading provider of user-centric software information for PC users. The idea behind the UpdateStar project is to ease the PC users’ software life.

UpdateStar’s vertical approach to how users access and acquire all their software on their PC provides them with software information, updates, and downloads as well as licenses - all from one place: UpdateStar.

The UpdateStar client provides users with a personalized world-class service by keeping a PC’s software up to date, increasing the user’s security and productivity. UpdateStar currently provides users with program update information for 4.5 million installations - daily. The UpdateStar software search engine offers access to our comprehensive database with access to more than 259,000 software products.

The global user community helps to build and complete the UpdateStar database by providing up-to-date data to the UpdateStar database.

UpdateStar not only provides the users with valuable information, but also offers optimal licensing options for shareware and commercial products. As a further advantage, UpdateStar delivers user-centric individual software news and coupons for more than 4000 commercial products.

The UpdateStar product portfolio: UpdateStar Freeware, UpdateStar Premium, UpdateStar SigParser and UpdateStar Kahuna

UpdateStar is the leading provider of user-centric software information for PC users. The idea behind the UpdateStar project is to ease the PC users’ software life.

UpdateStar’s vertical approach to how users access and acquire all their software on their PC provides them with software information, updates, and downloads as well as licenses - all from one place: UpdateStar.

name: Digital Bloom
tag_list: art, gallery, design, wallpaper, visuals, frame, screen, vj
overview:
With the service of digitalbloom, now everyone can change any flatscreen, projector, computer or mobile phone into a frame for digital art. Bleakly screensavers, the old-fashioned fireplace-video or virtual aquaria are things of the past.

digitalbloom is an art label that signs talented artists around the globe to present them to a bigger audience and to sell their works in digital form via www.digitalbloom.com. The young company offers sophisticated images and videos from its range of international artists. The variety of styles reaches from classical photography and painting over illustration and animation to video art of all kind. At the website the user has the possibility to browse artworks, to manage his purchased images and videos in his own user area and to download it for the display on all kinds of hardware. Unlike many other websites that present digital art, digitalbloom is a curated digital art gallery, not a user generated platform. The selection of the artworks and artists is made by an art-jury that was especially formed to guarantee a constant quality to the buyer and its featured artists. Just like at a normal art gallery, digitalbloom shares the revenue of each sold work with the artist, for whom the accedence is for free. Target groups of the new platform are art and design interested consumers as well as companies like hotels, bars, restaurants, clubs, shops etc.

The philosophy of digitalbloom is to make art more accessible to everybody and to provide a service that can turn all those black screens into great places for digital art. â€žEveryone should have the possibility to own art. digitalbloom connects art-interested people of the 21st century with the makers around the globeâ€œ, so the founders of the platform.

At the end of 2008, the company was founded by Hendrik Boeing and Markos Kern. The launch took place in April 2009. digitalbloom runs offices in Munich (Germany) and New York (USA).

name: SocialCom
tag_list: commerce, ecommerce, social-commerce
overview:
SocialCom enriches social networks with tools that enable Social Commerce in a reliable, measurable and profitable way without being intrusive.

As a result, social networks can expect significant revenues without putting off their ad-weary audience, while the audience can expect exciting new content.

SocialCom is a Berlin-based startup founded by a group of people with considerable experience in the Digital Media Industry.

They all have previously worked both for small enterprises and big corporations.

name: GrowVotes
tag_list: politics, social-networking, elections, candidates, campaigns, voting, polling, issues, geo-location, geographic, local
overview:
GrowVotes.org is a user-generated social network that allows you to get to know the candidates running in your local elections.

GrowVotes.org connects you to people based on similar political beliefs. It helps you make better decisions on election day through communication with the candidates running in your local elections.

Make a ballot, support a candidate, voice your local concerns, donate to a campaign and (for goodness sake!) don’t go into the voting booth and vote for your state representatives by saying “eenie meenie meiney mo…”

overview:
Nylvi is a social marketplace for record collectors bringing together thousands of record collectors, record stores, independent labels and artists from all over the world.

Their aim is to provide a fun and useful service to record collectors and create a place where independent record stores, labels and artists easily can make their physical goods available to a dedicated community.

overview: Show what you’ve got, find what you like.

name: quoobs
tag_list: mobile, web, location-based, context-based, berlin, football, soccer, facebook, social
overview: quoobs creates sticky services. quoobs is a small start-up from Berlin whose people have been around in digital media for about 10 years. quoobs creates own stuff and sometimes get hitchhiked by others. quoobser love social networks, games and mobile services as well as a smooth cross platform integration. Focusing on user needs, quoobs creates consumer facing services and tries to ride on top of commoditized services.

name: Topicle
tag_list: search, verticalsearch, customsearch
overview: Topicle allows users to create vertical search engines by entering in a topic and hand-picking selected URL’s to fill that topic. Searches within the vertical will only look for content from the URL’s relevant to each vertical. Topicle’s founder Steffen Muller has some history with search having worked as a Product Manager at Google.

name: Zankapfel
tag_list: zankapfel, competition, gaming, voting
overview:
Zankapfel is a competitive voting platform where you can settle everyday conflicts with friends or complete strangers. Users vote users arguments over a given time and the winner wins the collected votes as an internal currency. On top of that it is possible to fight it out over a jackpot. The winner takes it all.

Munich based Zankapfel was angel-founded in 2007 and is run by CEO Marcus Janietz. The website is live since January 17th 2008.

name: be2
tag_list: online-dating, dating, matchmaking
overview:
The matchmaking service be2 was launched in April 2004 with its German website www.be2.de. With a clear focus on internationalization, be2 introduced its service to other countries and today is represented in an impressive 37 countries on six continents. This makes be2 the largest online matchmaking service by unique visitors in Europe and the world’s fastest growing one (Nielsen Net Ratings, April 2008, ComScore March 2008).

be2’s management team of five boasts 55 years of collective experience in the online industry and in nurturing start-ups into profitable firms. It’s wide-ranging expertise consists of top executive positions with Bertelsmann, Lycos, Scout 24 and management consulting companies such as Roland Berger. From the outset be2 has focused its activities on establishing an internationally structured organization. Today be2 employs 170 people from 43 nationalities with headquarters in Zurich, Switzerland and Grevenmacher, Luxembourg.

funding_rounds.source_description: Algorithmic Dating Site Be2 Raises â‚¬15m From Index
EDGAR

name: Susuh
tag_list: service-provider, sme, seo, profiles, matching, classified, local-business
overview:
Susuh is web service that provides search-engine optimized profiles for self-employed service provider as well as small and medium-sized enterprises.

Additionally, Susuh features a marketplace including an automated matching-process of demand and supply thus improving the acquisition of new clients. The matching is based upon Susuh’s self-developed category system of skills that allows every service provider to precisely communicate his or her talents to prospective customers. At the same time, Susuh is utilizing subscribed skills to generate search-engine friendly profiles.

Susuh is—in its base version—free of charge and available in German, English and Polish.

name: LaterLoop
tag_list: reading, send-to-mobile, app-engine
overview:
LaterLoop is a tool that allows users to save webpages they’re interested in and then read them later on their phones.

The tool was built using Google’s App Engine.
